ValidationRule.description: When a void is requested, only certain users can change to void.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT($Permission.DLSE_Sr_Cashier), NOT( CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator') ), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Void Requested'), ISCHANGED(Status__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to change the status while it is currently Void Requested
